info.name: Trello Dark Theme [V1.1.3]
info.description: A dark theme for Trello so you can work in the dark.
info.additionalInfo: Version 1.1.3 Mods in the sidebar are now readable. The Powerup notification counter in the sidebar is now readable. More things on the Butler page are now dark. Version 1.1.2 The Homepage is now fully dark. The Log in page is now fully dark. The Sign in page is now fully dark. Scrollbars in Lists are now visible. Version 1.1.1 The Add New List box is now dark. Version 1.1 Text inside of the Delete comment box is now white. Text inside of the Card preset box is now white. The Show less active boards button now has the correct color. Version 1.0.1 The emoticon select box now has readable text. More icons now have the right color. Checklist percentages are now white. The Add card or board box now uses the correct colors. The Butler is now dark. The Help box when you click on your profile picture now has white text. The Shortcuts list is now readable. Version 1.0 Initial release.

data.title: white font on a yellow field
white font on a yellow field
